title: Infocomm Technology | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: SITLEARN helps you gain expertise in frontier technologies such as data analytics, automation and AI to stay competitive.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Gain expertise in frontier technologies such as data analytics, automation and AI to stay competitive in the digital era.

Be equipped with highly sought-after competencies to navigate an ever-changing digital landscape. Gain expertise in the latest digital tools. And secure competitive advantage through the mastery of data analytics, automation, AI and other frontier technologies.

“The Python course exceeded my expectations! The comprehensive curriculum, engaging exercises, and clear explanations made learning Python enjoyable. The hands-on projects were particularly valuable in solidifying my understanding. Highly recommend it for anyone looking to master Python!"
Agile Orientation for Digital Transformation: Concepts, Practices and Mindsets
Master Agile methodology in this 2-day course. Gain theory, practical skills, and toolkits for real-world implementation and success
Be introduced to creative AI, covering generative models, their applications, ethics, and hands-on experience.
This course demystifies machine learning concepts and helps you gain technical grounding and foresight for digital transformation in business.
AI and Machine Learning, Computer Ethics and Privacy
Earn micro-credentials in Applied Computing and unlock career opportunities in areas such as software and data engineering, machine learning, and more.
Be recognised for your acquired competencies through the attainment of Specialist Certificates, or stack them towards a BSc (Honours) in Applied Computing at SIT.
Learning for Life Series - Seaw Ker Boon

He may have already traded in his student card for a staff pass, but SIT alumni and staff member Seaw Ker Boon chose to head back to the classroom to become a student once again. The aspiring software architect shares why he attended the Machine Learning courses under the SITLEARN programme.
SIT Partners MINDEF to Offer Cyber NSF Scheme

Minister for Education (Higher Education and Skills) and Second Minister for Defence Ong Ye Kung officiated at the signing of a work-learn Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) between the Ministry of Defence (MINDEF)’s Defence Cyber Organisation (DCO) and the Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT) on 12 February 2018. The MOU was signed by Defence Cyber Chief Mr David Koh and Professor Loh Han Tong, Deputy President (Academic) and Provost, SIT.
The recent outbreak of WannaCry affected more than 200,000 individuals in over 150 countries, including Singapore.
Subscribe now and receive our brochure for the latest updates on our courses, events and insights.
By clicking "Subscribe", you agree to our "

" and also agree that SIT (and its service providers and agents) may collect, use, disclose and/or process your personal data to send you information related to the topic(s) of interest you have selected above, which may include information on courses, seminars, events, resources and/or surveys offered by SIT and/or its Overseas University partners.

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.
